name: Reminder App
shortDescription: A MERN stack typescript app with real time TCP server and high level animation using framer motion.
description: This is a simple reminder application that records any time a user opens the application and persist any timer a user already saved, it does that via a user id that stored in the local storage that corresponds to a user id in a mongo db collection. The server (express.js) and the client (next.js) communicate via web sockets.
